comment._content: There seems to be a feature on this artist in the magazine American Artist October 1956 Volume 20, Number 8, Issue 198. The article is titled Shinji Ishikawa by Frederick Whitaker See: http://cgi.ebay.com/AMER-ARTIST-October-1956-ZYGMUND-MENKES-EDMUND-BRUCKER_W0QQitemZ250385112641QQcmdZViewItemQQimsxZ20090307?IMSfp=TL090307182015r5145
